document_data.name: Nagahydra
document_data.mainbody: '''Nagahydras''' were a rare minor subspecies of [[naga]]. Like all nagas, they were considered [[Serpentfolk]] by other [[Scaled Ones]].<ref>
document_data.Description:
Nagahydras were serpentine creatures approximately {{SI|20|ft|long=yes}} long and weighing about {{SI|2000|lb|k|long=yes}}. The scales could be of many different colors, including black, deep purple, emerald green, green-gold, bright crimson, and silver. Nagahydras had five necks and vaguely humanoid heads. Bright red and orange spikes ran down the spine.
<!--==Personality==-->
document_data.Abilities:
Nagahydras could regenerate cut-off heads unless fire or [[acid]] was applied to the stump. Nagahydras were known to have venomous fangs.

Nagahydras were accomplished sorcerers, capable of casting spells of up to mid-to-high tier; they could also utilize spells that were typically considered to be restricted to [[cleric]]s, particularly spells of the [[Destruction domain|Destruction]] and [[Scalykind domain|Scalykind]] domains.
document_data.Combat: Nagahydras attacked with the venomous fangs and many spells.
document_data.Society:
Nagahydras normally dwelled in temperate forests, and in [[Faer√ªn]] were recorded to live in the jungles of [[Chult]], the [[Mhair Jungles]], and in the [[Qurth Forest]].

Nagahydras typically spoke [[Common]] and at least one other language, such as [[Celestial language|Celestial]], [[Abyssal language|Abyssal]], or [[Infernal language|Infernal]].
document_data.History: Nagahydras came into existence after the fall of [[Mhairshaulk]] and the diversification of the major naga subspecies. They specifically were created when some [[water naga]]s tried to reverse said diversification.<ref>
